name: AS THE CROW FLIES
description: The Exalt always knows the shortest mundane route between where she is and where she wants to be, even if unconventional. She may cut corners a number of times equal to her Essence during a travel venture without suffering the consequences.

modes.name: Liminal
modes.title: Wandering Outcast Journey
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote. In shadowlands or the Underworld, the Liminal may cut corners one additional time above her Essence without suffering consequences.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Finding the Golden Path
modes.effect: Commit 1 mote. Name a destination on the same plane of existence. When journeying toward it, the time scale is reduced by one step.

name: BEAST-UPLIFTING HARMONY
description: Enhances the Exalt’s familiar with up to Essence number of benefits, such as improving dice pools, speech, health levels, magical traits. The charm can be repurchased for additional familiars.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Godly Companion
modes.effect: The familiar becomes a minor god and may travel between Yu-Shan and Creation to deliver/retrieve messages or objects. Gains dematerialize, immortal (god), and magical beast qualities.

name: CALLING THE RIDER’S COMPANION
description: Spend 1 mote to summon a mount, which arrives quickly, usually by end of scene. Reduces environmental penalties to riding by two. If the mount is a familiar, it appears instantly. Mount lasts until session end.

name: FATHOMS-FED SPIRIT
description: Removes venture obstacles to ports the Exalt has been to. Cannot be knocked overboard. May commit 1 mote to reduce sailing hazards by Essence while engaged in sailing.

modes.name: Getimian
modes.title: Once-Visited Port Recollection
modes.effect: May treat any port visited in Origin as known, reducing the journey’s time scale by 1.

name: HARDSHIP-SURVIVING SPIRIT
description: Commit 1 mote to double 9s on resisting mundane heat/cold. Automatically finds provisions for herself and others regardless of climate.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Beast Hide Adaptation
modes.effect: While in shape of region-native animal, Lunar gets benefits of this Charm at no cost.

name: HIDDEN SHORTCUT REVELATION
description: Spend 1 mote to reveal location of hidden passages/portals in long range. Must still fulfill activation requirements. If hidden by flawless magic, Exalt adds Essence bonus successes to roll-off.

name: IMMORTAL MARINER’S ADVANTAGE
description: Commit 1 mote to gain three automatic successes on all mundane sailing tasks. Doesn’t apply to contested rolls like boarding or ramming.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Blessing the Hull
modes.effect: Enemies boarding must pass Fortitude + Integrity (diff. 3) or be thrown overboard; diff. 5 for supernatural beings. If thrown, gain 1 anima.

modes.name: Infernal
modes.title: Sea-Devil Insight
modes.effect: While on vessel, it is immune to Malfeas hazards such as acidic seas.

name: RIDER-AND-MOUNT UNITY
description: While mounted, Exalt may use movement and defense Charms on behalf of mount.

modes.name: Dragon-Blooded
modes.title: Great Heart Companion
modes.effect: The mount is immune to anima damage and counts as Hearthmate for Charm effects.

modes.name: Solar
modes.title: King-of-Horses Surety
modes.effect: Mount cannot be knocked down; unhorse gambits cost +3 against Solar.

modes.name: Lunar
modes.title: Blood-of-the-Moon Blessing
modes.effect: When mount is attacked, Lunar may take 1 Health level, reducing raw damage by 3 dice.

modes.name: Sidereal
modes.title: Ride the Dragon
modes.effect: Commit 2 motes to give mount a draconic form capable of flight at double speed. Afterward it suffers -5 dice penalty until a full day’s rest.

name: SWIFT ARTILLERY TECHNIQUE
description: Spend 1 mote during fire ordnance action. Reduces flurry/environmental penalties by 2. Doesn’t count toward ordnance action limit. May create Essence ammo by spending 1 mote or 1 anima.

name: TRACKLESS REGION NAVIGATION
description: Commit 1 mote to reduce Navigate penalties by Essence. Always finds shelter. Gains Essence dice to overcome travel obstacles; does not count toward dice limit. Immune to injury/fatigue obstacles during travel ventures.
